reviews.review_msg: This class is enjoyable if you ACTUALLY READ THE LITERATURE ASSIGNED, if you don't it's boring and stressful. If you know the books you have to read for the class BEFORE classes start, READ THEM. It saves so much time (Library, Online etc...). There are 2 essays about 1400 words and the final was 3 essay questions in 2 hours. Minard's a good prof.
